name: Fragment 48
description:
A unique textblock based on generative text co-authored by Sasha Stiles and her AI alter ego, Technelegy. 2021, Edition of 1. 

Fragment 48 is an extract from “BINA48 in the Garden,” which appears in Stiles’ book “Technelegy.”

Sasha Stiles is a poet, artist and AI researcher whose work at the intersection of text and technology probes what it means to be human in a nearly post-human era. sashastiles.com.

Part of the inaugural collection of theVERSEverse.com.
